mapper.select: select a.* from sys_authority a inner join sys_role_auth ra on a.id = ra.auth_id where ra.role_id = #{roleId}

select sa.* from mssy_admin.sys_user_role sur right join mssy_admin.sys_role_auth sra on sra.role_id = sur.role_id and sur.user_id = #{userId} left join mssy_admin.sys_authority sa on sa.id = sra.auth_id
